query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 1 That sun which once warmed my breast with love, 2 had revealed to me, with its beautiful truth, 3 through testing and re-testing, its sweet aspect;

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 4 and I, in order to confess correctly and certainly 5 myself, as much as was appropriate, 6 raised my head to speak more loftily;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 7 but a vision appeared that held me 8 so tightly to itself, to be seen, 9 that I did not remember my confession.
query.result: 7 tetapi sebuah penglihatan muncul yang menahan 8 diriku begitu erat, untuk dilihat, 9 sehingga aku tidak ingat pengakuanku.
